changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE rental ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, rental_uid uuid UNIQUE NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, payment_uid uuid NOT NULL, car_uid uuid NOT NULL, date_from TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, date_to TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL CHECK (status IN ('IN_PROGRESS', 'FINISHED', 'CANCELED')) );
